npc.name: リゼット・ド・ヴァレンティオン

lines: Valentione's Day is upon us once more, and I, Lisette de Valentione, have come to fill hearts the realm over with the warmth of love, passionate and pure!
Our events will capture your heart, too, adventurer! Or, at least they will once you've done me the tiniest of favors...
Would you mind checking in on little Astrid for me? She's still quite new to all this, and I'd feel sooo much better if someone lent her delicate efforts a steadying hand.
Valentione's Day is upon us once more, and I, Lisette de Valentione, have come to fill hearts the realm over with the warmth of love, passionate and pure!
How stands the reservoir of rapture within your bosom, adventurer? Whomever your favored partner might be, our fortune-tellers can help sound the depths of your unplumbed affinity!

obj.n: ヴァレンティオンデーと相性占い
